name: USA Facts
description:
USA FACTS - Freeware Windows Program

This program allows the user to learn, study, and reviews various facts about the United States. There are six screens which cover a map of the USA, state capitals, state flowers, state flags, state nicknames, and the state abbreviations.
If the user is stumped the hint key (H) will flash the answer. However, the penalty for using this increases with each use.
Each screen records the score, number of hints used, and the time needed to complete the level. The timer may be disabled as some users find it distracting. Each screen has a STUDY MODE which lets the user study and review the material at a relaxed pace.
A printable REPORT SCREEN will show the score, time, and hints for each level completed. Users may go back and improve scores or start all over.
This game has no advertising and neither collects or transmits any data whatsoever. It is free to all and may be installed and distributed freely. Visit https://sites.google.com/view/rtcgames/home for over 30 freeware programs and apps made by the author.
